name: The Hasselback potato – The perfect cross between baked and roasted
ingredients:
First prepare the potatoes. If you wish to leave the skins on, then give them a wash, otherwise peel them.
Cut slices into the potato, roughly 3-4mm (1/8 inch) using a wooden spoon as a cutting board (see picture above)
Place the potatoes onto a baking tray. Brush with the butter and sprinkle with salt.
Put the baking tray into the oven for 60 mins, re basting with the butter from the tray after about 30 mins, making sure that it gets into the openings of the potato
